mapper.select: select *, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') fmtdate, format(price, 0) fmtprice from market where sid=#{sid}
select count(*) from market where title like concat('%', #{query}, '%')
select *, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') from mcomments where sid=#{sid} order by mcid desc limit #{start}, #{size}
select count(*) from mcomments where mcid=#{mcid}
select count(*) from market where photonum=#{photonum}
mapper.insert: insert into market(uid, title, photo, contents, price, category, photonum) values(#{uid}, #{title}, #{photo}, #{contents}, #{price}, #{category}, #{photonum})
insert into mcomments(sid, uid, body) values(#{sid}, #{uid}, #{body})
mapper.update: update market set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, price=#{price}, category=#{category} where sid=#{sid}
update market set photo=#{photo} where sid=#{sid}
update mcomments set body=#{body}, regdate=now() where mcid=#{mcid}
update market set vcnt=vcnt+1 where sid=#{sid}
update market set rcnt=rcnt+#{amount} where sid=#{sid}
